original_text: People will no longer be happy in the land where this fruit grows. I will stop them making wine from their grapes. They will not stamp on their grapes and shout with joy. Instead, the shouts will be shouts about trouble. People will no longer be happy in the land where this fruit grows. I will stop them making wine from their grapes. They will not stamp on their grapes and shout with joy. Instead, the shouts will be shouts about trouble. People will no longer be happy in the land where this fruit grows.
korean_text: 기쁨과 환희가 옥토와 모압 땅에서 빼앗겼도다 내가 포도주 틀에 포도주가 끊어지게 하리니 외치며 밟는 자가 없을 것이라 그 외침은 즐거운 외침이 되지 못하리로다

sentences.original_text: People will no longer be happy
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 더 이상 행복하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: in the land where this fruit grows
I will stop them making wine
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 포도주를 만드는 것을 막을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will not stamp on their grapes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 포도를 밟지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Instead, the shouts will be shouts
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 그 외침은 외침이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: People will no longer be happy
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 더 이상 행복하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: in the land where this fruit grows
